message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I think the product is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I appreciate your offer, $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. Could you consider something closer to $16,000?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $14,000. Can you consider my revised offer?
